# Crystal of Reflection (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S,M (crystal shard worth at least 10 gp.)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One crystal

**Duration:** One minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 56

You take a small crystal and imbue it with magical power so that it floats near you like an *ioun stone*. Any time you are the target of a ray attack, you gain a +6 deflection bonus to Armor Class thanks to the crystal. If the ray misses you, it reflects back at the attacker (using the normal attack roll bonus).

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 4, Wizard 4 to Level.
